kickstart.post:
[Service] EnvironmentFile=/etc/sysconfig/docker ExecStart= ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -s overlay $DOCKER_OPTS Restart=always RestartSec=10
systemctl enable docker

[Unit] Description=Docker Socket for the API PartOf=docker.service
[Socket] ListenStream=/var/run/docker.sock SocketMode=0660 SocketUser=root SocketGroup=docker
[Install] WantedBy=sockets.target
systemctl enable docker.socket

[Unit] Description=stack-post After=multi-user.target
[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=-/usr/bin/mv /etc/sysconfig/stack-post /root/stack-post.sh ExecStart=-/usr/bin/chmod 755 /root/stack-post.sh ExecStart=-/bin/bash -c '/root/stack-post.sh > /root/stack-post.log' ExecStartPost=-/usr/bin/chmod 644 /root/stack-post.sh RemainAfterExit=no
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
systemctl enable stack-post.service >> stack.log 2>&1
[Unit] Description=stack-pre Before=network.target After=local-fs.target
[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=-/usr/bin/mv /etc/sysconfig/stack-pre /root/stack-pre.sh ExecStart=-/usr/bin/chmod 755 /root/stack-pre.sh ExecStart=-/bin/bash -c '/root/stack-pre.sh > /root/stack-pre.log' ExecStartPost=-/usr/bin/chmod 644 /root/stack-pre.sh RemainAfterExit=no
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
rm -f /etc/init.d/stack-pre rm -f /etc/init.d/stack-post systemctl enable stack-post.service >> stack.log 2>&1 systemctl enable stack-pre.service >> stack.log 2>&1
